Prayer: Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India, for
the issuance of Writ of Mandamus, directing the 4 th and 5 th respondents to
rectify the petitioner's date of birth is 13.12.1996 as per Birth Certificate,
instead of 13.07.1996 and her father's name as Mohideen Abdul Khader
instead of Mohamed Mohideen Abdul Khader in the School Transfer
Certificate as well as petitioner's 10 th Mark Sheet by considering the
petitioner's representation, dated 22.03.2016 to them within the time
period stipulated by this Court.
For Petitioner :

for R1 to R4
